title: Black crush
content:
My brand new pixel 4xl has a problem displaying dark videos and pictures, the dark areas of images look melted together and lose all the details, resulting in black spots with a weird purple tint around. This happens expecially with low brightness.
I don't know if it's an hardware issue but I hope it can be fixed by software update. At the moment I am considering returning it.
Did someone else experienced it?
